name: When You Are Here [Demo Visual Novel]
name_original: When You Are Here [Demo Visual Novel]
description:
On a hot summer day, Neo, a first-year college student. His life seemed to be going well until suddenly one day he found someone but he is not human.  He decided to help but his life is about to change! Neo has to help his new friend with mystical magic powers.

[This first chapter is in full development]

If  you enjoyed this visual novel, you could consider help me by supporting on my
